name: kobo-instapaper-proxy-lambda
description: Lambda handler that renders pages through headless Chrome and rewrites links for a proxy.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && CHROMIUM_SKIP_DOWNLOAD=true PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true npm ci --ignore-scripts && node ./scripts/build.js
scripts.install-browser: npx @puppeteer/browsers install chrome@stable && echo 'Copy the downloaded chrome to the Puppeteer cache folder so puppeteer-core can find it.'
